data.name: Reinforce AI Conference 2020
data.description: In recent years our ability to apply AI and Deep Learning to real-world problems and products has increased exponentially. Andrew Ng has famously said that AI is the “New Electricity”. It’s hard to think of a field that will not be profoundly changed by AI.
